participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: wise and reflective, with a touch of nostalgia.
participant_1.background: i'm very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television.

participant_2.name: Jasper
participant_2.personality: passionate and empathetic, with a quirky sense of style.
participant_2.background: i'm an animal activist. i have rainbow hair. i spend my time bird watching with my cats. my age is too old to say. the holidays make me depressed.
